Name: Death in Venice
Instructions: Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
POUR first 2 ingredients into chilled glass.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: On the bitter side of bittersweet, this is something of a cross between the Italian Spritz and Ernest Hemingway's Death in the Afternoon .
History: Created in 2010 by Tony Conigliaro at 69 Colebrooke Row , London, England.
